main event: A civilian observed a bright silver-blue object slowly descending in the southern sky for 40 minutes in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared very bright, likened to the brightness of the moon., The object had a visible tail as it descended., This report is part of the Project Blue Book collection of UFO observations., The observation is thought to be consistent with an auto-Jupiter at 75 degrees azimuth., The sighting lacked any physical evidence or photographs.
